posts.title: You want to create a SaaS? here is important key factors - part2
You want to create a SaaS? here is important key factors - part1
posts.subTitle: Software as a Service (SaaS) is a cloud-based software model that delivers applications to end-users through an internet browser. SaaS vendors host services and applications for customers to access on-demand. With a SaaS offering, you do not have to think about how the service is maintained or how the underlying infrastructure is managed
